content: Feeling the buzz of NYC again after Japan. The city's energy is a stark contrast. I've got a job offer from a tech startup here, but part of me still lingers in Tokyo. Decisions, decisions.

content: Just turned 22 and landed in NYC with a job offer in hand. But part of me still feels the pull of Tokyo. Do I embrace the new or hold onto the old?

content: Just got hit with a reality check. My startup's app isn't scaling well, and it's showing in our finances. Need a tech fix, fast. #StartupLife
